org.apache.flink.contrib.streaming.state

类 RocksDBReducingState<K,N,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.contrib.streaming.state.AbstractRocksDBState<K,N,ReducingState<V>,ReducingStateDescriptor<V>,V>
      • org.apache.flink.contrib.streaming.state.RocksDBReducingState<K,N,V>
  • 类型参数:
    K - The type of the key.
    N - The type of the namespace.
    V - The type of value that the state state stores.
    所有已实现的接口:
    AppendingState<V,V>, MergingState<V,V>, ReducingState<V>, State, InternalAppendingState<N,V,V>, InternalKvState<N>, InternalMergingState<N,V,V>, InternalReducingState<N,V>

    public class RocksDBReducingState<K,N,V>
extends AbstractRocksDBState<K,N,ReducingState<V>,ReducingStateDescriptor<V>,V>
implements InternalReducingState<N,V>
    ReducingState implementation that stores state in RocksDB.

    • 字段概要

      We disable writes to the write-ahead-log here.

    • 字段详细资料

      • valueSerializer

        private final TypeSerializer<V> valueSerializer
        Serializer for the values.

      • reduceFunction

        private final ReduceFunction<V> reduceFunction
        User-specified reduce function.

      • writeOptions

        private final org.rocksdb.WriteOptions writeOptions
        We disable writes to the write-ahead-log here. We can't have these in the base class because JNI segfaults for some reason if they are.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • RocksDBReducingState

        public RocksDBReducingState(org.rocksdb.ColumnFamilyHandle columnFamily,
                            TypeSerializer<N> namespaceSerializer,
                            ReducingStateDescriptor<V> stateDesc,
                            RocksDBKeyedStateBackend<K> backend)
        Creates a new RocksDBReducingState.
        参数:
        namespaceSerializer - The serializer for the namespace.
        stateDesc - The state identifier for the state. This contains name and can create a default state value.

    • 方法详细资料

      • get

        public V get()
        从接口复制的说明: AppendingState
        Returns the current value for the state. When the state is not partitioned the returned value is the same for all inputs in a given operator instance. If state partitioning is applied, the value returned depends on the current operator input, as the operator maintains an independent state for each partition.

        NOTE TO IMPLEMENTERS: if the state is empty, then this method should return null.

        指定者:
        get 在接口中 AppendingState<V,V>
        返回:
        The operator state value corresponding to the current input or null if the state is empty.

      • add

        public void add(V value)
         throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: AppendingState
        Updates the operator state accessible by AppendingState.get() by adding the given value to the list of values. The next time AppendingState.get() is called (for the same state partition) the returned state will represent the updated list.
        指定者:
        add 在接口中 AppendingState<V,V>
        参数:
        value - The new value for the state.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the system cannot access the state.

      • mergeNamespaces

        public void mergeNamespaces(N target,
                            java.util.Collection<N> sources)
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: InternalMergingState
        Merges the state of the current key for the given source namespaces into the state of the target namespace.
        指定者:
        mergeNamespaces 在接口中 InternalMergingState<N,V,V>
        参数:
        target - The target namespace where the merged state should be stored.
        sources - The source namespaces whose state should be merged.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - The method may forward exception thrown internally (by I/O or functions).
